calculations.name: MTD Value - Up
calculations.tableau_expression: if [MTD Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculation_context.Expression: if [MTD Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculated_fields.MTD Value - YoY: ([MTD Value] - [MTD Value - Last Year])/[MTD Value - Last Year]
calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
